FuncDef:
The dsa local-key-pair destroy command removes all local DSA keys including the host key pair and the server key pair.
By default, no local DSA keys are created.
Examples: Info: The name of the key which will be destroyed is HUAWEI_Host_DSA.
Warning: These keys will be destroyed. Continue? Please select [Y/N]: Y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you no longer need the local DSA key pairs, run the dsa local-key-pair destroy command to delete them.
Configuration Impact
The dsa local-key-pair destroy command deletes the local DSA host key pair, from the files on the master and slave main control boards the control board. Exercise caution when you run this command.
Precautions
The dsa local-key-pair create command is not saved in the configuration file. It only need to be run once and take effect even after the device restarts.
